tweet.html: RT @StateDept: Today, @HistoryAtState released Foreign Relations of the United States, 1917–1972, Volume VI, Public Diplomacy, 1961–1963. This volume documents the public diplomacy efforts of the John F. Kennedy administration. go.usa.gov/xn5xe #FRUS pic.twitter.com/dxk3g8ktfq
